channel.title: Editable Client For RSCD?
channel.description: I already have a client, but when i try to edit it and log in, it just tells me there's a client update, to download it, and then it doesn't log me in.. =\

item.title: Editable Client For RSCD?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Check that your version number in mudclient matches that of your server config.

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Client For RSCD?
item.dc:creator: @LInescapeowns LInescapeowns
item.description:
@LInescapeowns wrote:

its already hosted and up, but what i’m saying is that when i change the ip address the client connects to in settings.ini, then the client tells me when i try to log in on the server that i’ve already registered on and made sure is up, it tells me to download the newest update for the client, but when i change that ip back to the original one, it runs fine.
My Main Point Is That i Can’t change the settings on my client without it not working, so i need a different source that i can change to connect to my ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Client For RSCD?
item.dc:creator: @Jonesy1128 Jonesy1128
item.description:
@Jonesy1128 wrote:

Read a tutorial on starting up a server. you can’t merely play on a client, you must host it first. (Of localhost if your donig tests.)

Read full topic
